Text:
Why the back alley codec man? Whats wrong with avi xvid anyway?

Make sure you have the codec and player to play "MKV" files before you download this one. Better yet just download one of the 7 other releases of this episode.

Maybe you should just read the faq...

And this "back alley" codec is currently the most advanced video codec available and is used for most HDTV, HDDVD and BlueRay.
